activities: MEDAVANTE, Inc. is a global leader of centralized, expert psychological rating services to the pharmaceutical, biotechnology, and medical device industries. MedAvante collects personal information in two ways: 1) We collect and process clinical assessment information which may include personally identifiable and/or sensitive personal information in support of regulated clinical trials; 2) We will collect the consumer's name, address, and email address when he contacts us via our website.  MedAvante only use this information to respond to the consumer.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: off-line, on-line, electronic, and manually processed data.
recoursemech: TRUSTe is MedAvante's private sector dispute resolution mechanism that incorporates the safe harbor framework.
